qas.question: What speed is Saint Helena internet access?

Who provides the internet service in Saint Helena?

context: Saint Helena has a <a0_0><a4_0>1<a4_0/>0/3.6 Mbit/s<a0_0/> internet link via <a1_0>Intelsat 707<a1_0/> provided by <a2_0>SURE<a2_0/>. Serving a population of <a3_0>more than 4,000<a3_0/>, this single satellite link is considered inadequate in terms of bandwidth.
